messages.subject: Re: Unschooling travel
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Amy, I started a group, the website is below. It hasn t had much action for a while, but I am planning a trip to India next year. I am hoping that the site
messages.messageBody:
Hi Amy,

I started a group, the website is below. It hasn't had much action for a while, but I am planning a trip to India next year. I am hoping that the site will take off as a place for all unschoolers to meet & plan travels together.... feel free to post for any trip you would like unschoolers to accompany you...

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/TRAVULL/

neha

messages.msgSnippet: Yes, they re called, naturally, UNtravelers! There is a yahoogroup, just go the groups home page and search for untravelers. Karen ... -- When the power of
messages.messageBody:
Yes, they're called, naturally, UNtravelers!

There is a yahoogroup, just go the groups home page and search for
untravelers.

Karen
